product_name: Vittoria Zaffiro Pro Tech Foldable Bike Tire - 700 x 23
long_description: The Vittoria Zaffiro Pro Tech foldable bike tire is an economical, high-mileage tire designed to hold up in challenging conditions, making it great for winter training or long tours.
